title: 2-bedroom, laundry in-unit, $500 off deal if you apply at Marina!
posting_body: Apt #355 could be your new place to call home just in time for Fall!
in-unit washer and dryer, quartz counter tops, courtyard view and hardwood-like flooring!
Priced at $3164 for a 12 month lease
Each of our garden-style apartment homes for rent is finished in modern style with quartz countertops, a combination of hardwood-style vinyl flooring and carpet, and sleek, streamlined finishes.
Additional conveniences include air conditioning, spacious storage closets, a washer and dryer, and your own private patio or balcony to enjoy the fresh air.
With 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans in a variety of layouts, we’re sure to have the right one for you.
If you are not 100% satisfied with your home, you may transfer to a comparable residence within the community or terminate your lease.
Pricing and availability are subject to change without notice.
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
